thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 20 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SSLJ.com Ltd Secures $159 Mln Credit Line From Hubei Sanxia Rural Commercial Bank Intended For Working Capital

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SSLJ.com Ltd Secures $159 Mln Credit Line From Hubei Sanxia Rural Commercial Bank Intended For Working Capital

organizations.name: mln credit line from hubei sanxia rural commercial bank intended for working capital april

text:
April 20 (Reuters) - SSLJ.com Ltd:
* SSLJ.COM LIMITED SECURES USD159 MILLION CREDIT LINE FROM HUBEI SANXIA RURAL COMMERCIAL BANK INTENDED FOR WORKING CAPITAL
* SSLJ.COM LTD - ENTERED INTO STRATEGIC COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH HSRCB ON APRIL 16, 2018
* SSLJ.COM LTD - RECEIVED A CREDIT LINE OF UP TO RMB1 BILLION (APPROXIMATELY USD159 MILLION) FROM HUBEI SANXIA RURAL COMMERCIAL BANK CO. LTD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
